# Setup {-}

## Requirements {-}

To go through this tutorial, you need the following software installed:

[Python ≥3.5](https://www.python.org/)

[Snakemake ≥5.24.1](https://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/)

[Singularity ≥3.7.3](https://sylabs.io/guides/3.5/user-guide/quick_start.html)

## Plus {-}

To follow this tutorial, a plus would be to have this basic knowledge and resources:

A working account on Tabebuia

[Bases in BASH](https://www.pierre-giraud.com/shell-bash/)

[Bases in Python](https://www.pierre-giraud.com/python-apprendre-programmer-cours/)

A working account on a cluster
